Squizzy shrugs. "I'm fine with it either way. What do you want done 
first?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> :: Vamprah::
> 
> Vamprah was thinking a large while about the things that Squizzy 
had 
> told her. Maybe it would be a good idea to explore the ship.
> 
> "You have a good idea, Squizzy, I could explore the ship and later, 
> you can fix my optics circuits...Unless you whant do it right now." 
> said the femme.
